org.jasig.cas.support.spnego.web.flow.client

Class BaseSpnegoKnownClientSystemsFilterAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.webflow.action.AbstractAction
      • org.jasig.cas.support.spnego.web.flow.client.BaseSpnegoKnownClientSystemsFilterAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.webflow.execution.Action
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HostNameSpnegoKnownClientSystemsFilterAction, LdapSpnegoKnownClientSystemsFilterAction

    public class BaseSpnegoKnownClientSystemsFilterAction
extends org.springframework.webflow.action.AbstractAction
    Abstract class for defining a simple binary filter to determine whether a given client system should be prompted for SPNEGO / KRB / NTLM credentials. Envisioned implementations would include LDAP and DNS based determinations, but of course others may have value as well for local architectures.
    Since:
    4.1
    Author:
    Sean Baker sean.baker@usuhs.edu, Misagh Moayyed

      • ipPatternMatches

        protected boolean ipPatternMatches(String remoteIp)
        Simple pattern match to determine whether an IP should be checked. Could stand to be extended to support "real" IP addresses and patterns, but for the local / first implementation regex made more sense.
        Parameters:
        remoteIp - the remote ip
        Returns:
        whether the remote ip received should be queried

      • getRemoteHostName

        protected String getRemoteHostName(String remoteIp)
        Convenience method to perform a reverse DNS lookup. Threads the request through a custom Runnable class in order to prevent inordinately long user waits while performing reverse lookup.
        Parameters:
        remoteIp - the remote ip
        Returns:
        the remote host name
